description.text: The clan <<target>> is losing prominence on the head of the clan's homeplace. If this continues, the clan risks losing its integrity and disappear. There's currently a chance though for the leader of the clan, <<target.leader>>, to move the location of their homeplace to a new location. There likely won't be another opportunity to make this move in the future.

options.text: [Warning: simulation AI only] We'll a random location for the new homeplace...

effects.text: the clan <<target>> moves its core to a random location near its previous homeplace

options.text: We'll move our homeplace to a better location...

properties.value: ''Select group the clan <<target>> tribe should move its homeplace to...''

effects.text: Player selects a valid location near the clan's previous homeplace

options.text: We will remain at our current location and persevere!

effects.text: Clan <<target>>: cohesion preference (<<target.preferences.cohesion>>) increases to a value between <<min_new_cohesion_pref>> and <<max_new_cohesion_pref>>
